title: David and Goliath
summary: David defeats the giant Goliath with a sling and a stone. While Israelâ€™s army trembles, David boldly confronts the Philistine, trusting in God. His victory brings him national fame and royal favor.

faq.question: Why was David confident in facing Goliath?
faq.answer: Because he trusted in God, who had delivered him from lions and bears before.

faq.question: What did David use to defeat Goliath?
faq.answer: A sling and one smooth stone.
